name: 戴维·J·库蒂斯
name_full: 戴维·J·库蒂斯 David J. Curtis
introduction: David J. Curtis film and television credits include principal roles in Dexter: New Blood, Don't Look Up, Julia, Kevin Can F*** Himself, The Forger, Diamond Ruff, Gloveless, R.I.P.D., 4 Cambridge Center, Stories for Dinner, The Maiden Heist, Under The Hood, Edge of Darkness, How to Make it in America, Clear History, and The Makeover. David is featured in AudioComics/Audible audio books by Jeffery Deaver called "The Starling Project," starring Alfred Molina, and "Locke and Key" by Joe Hill, starring Haley Joel Osment. David's most memorable stage credits include Identity Crisis, A Soldier's Play, To Hell with this Village, Brokeology, The Last Days of Judas Iscariot, Ascension, Mama, I Want to Sing, A Streetcar Named Desire, 12 Angry Jurors, and The Crucible. He has also been featured in many regional and national television commercials, voiceover and industrial/educational videos. In addition to acting, David is also an accomplished percussionist/drummer, producer, engineer and composer. Mr. Curtis is a proud member of the SAG/AFTRA union.
